question: "Mount Thor", the mountain with the "greatest purely vertical drop" in the world, is located in which nation?
explanation: Canada houses Mount Thor, the mountain with the greatest purely vertical drop in the world. It is located in Auyuittuq National Park on Baffin Island, Nunavut, Canada. It has a vertical drop of 1250 metres. The parent range of Mount Thor is the Baffin Mountains.
